tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE luxury_travel_agency (
    agency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agency_name VARCHAR(255),
    airline_relationships JSON,
    hotel_relationships JSON,
    tour_operator_relationships JSON
)

CREATE TABLE exclusive_deals (
  deal_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  airline_id INT NOT NULL,
  hotel_id INT NOT NULL,
  operator_id INT NOT NULL,
  price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE airlines (
  airline_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  airline_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  airline_rating FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE hotels (
  hotel_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hotel_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  hotel_rating FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE tour_operators (
  tour_operator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  tour_operator_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  tour_operator_rating FLOAT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE packages (
  package_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  package_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  package_description TEXT,
  package_price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
  airline_id INT NOT NULL,
  hotel_id INT NOT NULL,
  tour_operator_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (airline_id) REFERENCES airlines(airline_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (hotel_id) REFERENCES hotels(hotel_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (tour_operator_id) REFERENCES tour_operators(tour_operator_id)
)

CREATE TABLE deals (
  deal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  deal_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  deal_description TEXT,
  deal_discount DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL,
  package_id INT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (package_id) REFERENCES packages(package_id)
)
